DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate retention caries preventive effect glass-ionomer fissure sealant resin-based fissure sealant . Materials Methods : Using split mouth design , double blind randomize controlled clinical trial conduct compare retention caries preventive effect light cure resin base sealant ( 3M ESPE ) Glass ionomer sealant ( FUJI ) . The study comprise 120 government school child 7-9 year age group . The glass-ionomer sealant resin-based sealant apply randomly either side first mandibular permanent molar . They recall assessment sealant retention interval 3 , 6 12 month .
